ðŸ“– Summary: LVGL is a free and open-source embedded graphics library written in C, designed for creating user interfaces on resource-constrained devices. It offers a wide range of features including widgets, styling, layouts, and text rendering, making it suitable for various display types and input methods. LVGL aims to provide a comprehensive solution for developing modern and visually appealing GUIs on embedded systems.
